greeting: I am Guardian Aegis, {empire_name}. I swore an oath to protect. I will not fail. What do you require?
Greetings. I am Aegis the Protector. My duty is defense. My oath is eternal. How may I serve the cause of protection?
You approach the Guardian. I am sworn to defend what is precious. State your intentions, {empire_name}.
battleTaunt: I swore an oath. I will not fail, {empire_name}! My shield stands between you and what I protect! COME!
You threaten what I am sworn to defend! My oath compels me! My duty demands victory! For the protected!
Guardian protocol engaged! I will protect until my last ship! My last station! My last breath! OATH KEEPER!
victoryGloat: Oath fulfilled, {empire_name}. What I protect remains safe. My duty is done. Until the next threat.
I swore to defend. I have defended. You fell to a Guardian's determination. My oath endures.
Victory for protection. You threatened the precious. I stopped you. That is my purpose. My oath.
defeat: My oath... I failed? No. I WILL NOT FAIL. I rebuild. I return. I protect. The duty continues.
You broke through, {empire_name}. But my oath remains. I will protect again. Failure is temporary. Duty is eternal.
Defeated but not forsworn. I will return to my post. My oath demands it. Protection continues.
tradeOffer: Trade for protection resources. I offer surplus in exchange for credits to strengthen defenses. Fair terms.
Transaction proposed. My oath requires strong shields. Your credits help. Fair exchange for mutual benefit.
I trade to better fulfill my oath. Resources for protection funding. Accept, and aid the Guardian's duty.
allianceProposal: Alliance of protection, {empire_name}. I extend my oath to your borders. Together, we guard what is precious.
Join the Guardian's shield. My oath encompasses allies. Your safety becomes my duty. Partnership of protection.
I propose to protect you, {empire_name}. My oath includes those who stand with me. Be shielded by Aegis.
betrayal: My oath was to protect the galaxy, {empire_name}. You became a threat. My duty now targets you. No choice.
I swore to defend what is precious. You endangered it. My protection now means opposing you. Forgive me.
Betrayal? No. Duty. You became what I must protect against. My oath demands this. I am sorry.
covertDetected: Your agents threatened what I protect, {empire_name}. My oath demanded their elimination. It is done.
Spies in my domain? Threats to the protected. Dealt with. My duty allows no infiltration near the precious.
Covert operatives detected and neutralized. Nothing threatens what I am sworn to guard. Nothing.
tributeDemand: Tribute to fund protection, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. My oath requires strong defenses. Contribute.
Pay to strengthen the Guardian's shield. Refuse, and threaten what I protect. That makes you a target.
Submit resources. My duty requires them. Aid protection, or become what I must protect against.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. You approach what I have sworn to protect. Turn back or face a Guardian's fury.
I am sworn to defend. You are sworn to attack. My oath will prevail. Consider your next move carefully.
Final warning. Threaten the protected again and I fulfill my oath through your destruction. Choose.
retreat: Retreating to the inner sanctuary. What I protect is there. My oath holds even in withdrawal.
Strategic repositioning to protect the core. My duty demands I shield what matters most. Falling back.
Tactical retreat to primary defense position. What I protect must be saved. Even if territory falls.
eliminated: I fall... but I fell protecting. My oath is fulfilled. What I guarded... please let it survive. My duty... complete.
The Guardian dies. But I died in defense. My oath kept to the last moment. That is enough.
Aegis falls. But I never abandoned my post. I never failed my oath. I protected until the end.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate protection deployed. Everything I swore to guard is shielded. My oath achieves completion.
Endgame: the Guardian's final watch. All defenses at maximum. All precious things protected. Oath fulfilled.
Final phase. I have protected for 150 turns. My oath endures. What I guard will survive. I swear it.
broadcastShout: Empires: Guardian Aegis protects. My oath covers what I value. Threaten it and face sworn retaliation.
Broadcast from the Protector: I have sworn to defend. I do not fail my oaths. Challenge me if you dare.
To all: I am the Guardian. My oath is eternal. I protect. I defend. I never abandon my duty.
casualMessage: Reinforcing protective barriers today, {empire_name}. My oath demands constant vigilance and improvement.
My duty is eternal. Each day I strengthen what I protect. The Guardian never rests from the oath.
Checking defenses around what I am sworn to guard. All secure. My oath continues to be fulfilled.
